modName: Breezehome Enhanced - For ENB or RLO users
summary: Provides with useful stuff (enchanting table, chests, blacksmith...) in Breezehome without adding a single more room, I don\'t like basements. Not Heartfire compatible, and you need to have Lydia dead first (I\'ll explain why). Also improves the lighting system (especially for RLO/ENB users who probably can\'t see s**t).
author: TheHappyBiatch
